name: Law Offices of Marshall C Watson Reviews

review.title: “good company”
review.pros: Pros – MCW is a pretty good company to work for. The salaries are somewhat good.
review.cons: Cons – hours are not flexible. It is a straight 8:30-5:30 job.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Improve your management and people skills. Not everyone can just completely be on board with everything you say to them just because you're a manager. Figure out how to motivate people more.

review.title: “Choice Legal/Marshall Watson....”
review.pros: Pros – They don't micromanage. They let you do your job. Good benefits as well.
review.cons: Cons – Don't expect to get a review. I was there for 2 years before I got a raise (after months of asking). I was laid off a month later. They are not concerned with what kind of job you do, just hiring/retaining the cheapest employees.They are constantly laying people off (about 100 people since August 2013). You cant feel safe there.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be loyal to the employees who are loyal to you and that do a good job. Don't hire people and then get rid of them after 2 years just because you think you pay them too much.

review.title: “Needs Improvement”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly atmosphere and great benefits
review.cons: Cons – High turn over rateMandatory overtime - including weekendsLack of pay equity. some employees were paid up to $10.00 per hour more for doing the same job as their colleague. Pay was not based on experience or education.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Develop current staff and promote from within

review.title: “challenging”
review.pros: Pros – Does not micro manage. Ability to learn all aspects of the legal field, transactional and litigation
review.cons: Cons – Too many changes on a daily basis
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be consistent. Choose a formula and stick with it.

review.title: “Opportunity to learn”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunity to learn about legal processes and to prepare guidance documents for these processes. Variety in the jobs that are available.
review.cons: Cons – Not all of the employees are very professional and many lack basic understanding of how a corporation should operate. Many of the employees are not competent to execute their jobs effectively.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The Firm should establish a Quality Assurance Program and regularly engage in process improvement. Clear and metrics should be established and monitored for compliance.
